# The `M68kMCInstLower.cpp` File Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

This file contains code to lower <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/m68k">M68k</a> MachineInstrs to their corresponding <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcinst">MCInst</a> records. <a href="#details">More...</a>

## Description {#details}

This file contains code to lower <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/m68k">M68k</a> MachineInstrs to their corresponding <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcinst">MCInst</a> records.

<Link id="l00164" /><CodeLine lineNumber="164"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> i = 0, e = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>-&gt;getNumOperands(); i != e; ++i) &#123;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00169" /><CodeLine lineNumber="169"><span class="doxyHighlight">      OutMI.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcinst/#ad5a79c04398dc86a3acfe7f8713216eb">addOperand</a>(MCOp.value());</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00171" /><CodeLine lineNumber="171"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00172" /><CodeLine lineNumber="172"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// TAILJMPj, TAILJMPq - Lower to the correct jump instructions.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00173" /><CodeLine lineNumber="173"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (Opcode == M68k::TAILJMPj || Opcode == M68k::TAILJMPq) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00174" /><CodeLine lineNumber="174"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(OutMI.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcinst/#a3c5c7109f398fdca515509e2284cd8c0">getNumOperands</a>() == 1 &amp;&amp; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;Unexpected number of operands&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00175" /><CodeLine lineNumber="175"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">switch</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (Opcode) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00176" /><CodeLine lineNumber="176"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">case</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> M68k::TAILJMPj:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00177" /><CodeLine lineNumber="177"><span class="doxyHighlight">      Opcode = M68k::JMP32j;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00178" /><CodeLine lineNumber="178"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">break</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00179" /><CodeLine lineNumber="179"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">case</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> M68k::TAILJMPq:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00180" /><CodeLine lineNumber="180"><span class="doxyHighlight">      Opcode = M68k::BRA8;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00181" /><CodeLine lineNumber="181"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">break</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00182" /><CodeLine lineNumber="182"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00183" /><CodeLine lineNumber="183"><span class="doxyHighlight">    OutMI.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcinst/#ae844d6ff99f067e6672e004ed7613c24">setOpcode</a>(Opcode);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00184" /><CodeLine lineNumber="184"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00185" /><CodeLine lineNumber="185"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
